description: '''Mayfair Laundry''' Is an American Rock band from [[Los Angeles]], California, who started making music together in 1996. They released two [[studio album]]s, ''Scrub'' (1998) and ''New and Improved'' (1999). They then took a 20+ year hiatus while exploring solo projects, production work, and more. In 2022 they reunited to release their first new music in many years.
